summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the 1994 annual budget by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowances in the 1994 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various city funds to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 1994 Budget by appropriation, reappropriation, and transfer from various City funds including the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
